text: Džeriņš (feminine: Džeriņa) is a Latvian topographic surname. Individuals with the surname include: * Andris Džeriņš (born 1988), Latvian professional ice hockey player; * Guntis Džeriņš (born 1985), Latvian professional ice hockey player; * Ralfs Džeriņš (born 1997), Latvian professional football player. Category:Latvian toponymic surnames Category:Latvian-language masculine surnames
title: Džeriņš
